title: JNYLYFC 60 Pcs Reusable Slider Ziplock Food Storage Bags | Freezer & Sandwich Bags 3 Sizes (6.8L/1.7L/0.8L) with Expandable Bottom | Includes Bag Holder & Date Pen | BPA Free Leakproof
features: 【3 Sizes & 60 Pcs Value Pack】Organize your kitchen effortlessly with our 60-piece reusable food freezer bags set! Includes large gallon slider ziplock bags for meat (15 PCS, 1.8 gallon), medium freezer bags (20 PCS, 0.47gallon), and small sandwich bags (25 PCS, 0.2gallon), offering versatile storage solutions for prepped ingredients and ready-to-cook meals. Please ensure your food cools down before filling the bags, as they are not designed for hot foods. These bags are not suitable for use in the oven, or dishwasher. Note: If you want to put it in the microwave, please open the bag mouth. And the maximum temperature should not exceed 100 ℃.

【Leak-proof & Zip Lock Seal Design】The food storage bag adopts a zip lock style sealing design, which is easy to open and close, dustproof and moisture-proof, with strong sealing performance, keeping the food fresh and not easy to mix cross odors

【Eco-Friendly & Thickened & Reusable】Our reusable slider zip lock bags are made of pe material, which can be in direct contact with food, bpa-free. The thickened material has strong toughness, durability, and is not easily damaged. Perfect for storing fruits, vegetables, nuts, cookies, snacks, grains, meat, cosmetics, toys, and more, keeping everything fresh, safe, and well-organized

【Expandable Bottom& Bag holder】The stand and fill airtight zip seal bags feature an expandable bottom design, which not only increases the capacity of the food bag, but also makes it easier to stand when the bag is full, making the refrigerator storage neater. And the included adjustble bag holder stabilizes bags while filling, reducing mess and saving time. Adjustble arms with two different heights, suitable for bags of most sizes. What's important, bag holder is enough to hold the bag upside down, is great for letting the bag dry off after being washed out. And it folds down flat so will store in a drawer easily when its not being used

【Bonus Writable Area & Pen】Our heavy-duty freezer bag with a writing area, and each package is equipped with a marker pen, which allows you to easily record your stored food, such as dates, food names, and other information, making it easy for you to quickly identify item information
description: Keep Life Organized with Our Ultimate Slide-Lock Storage Bags! Upgrade your storage game with our premium 60-pack slide-lock, designed to simplify your daily routine. The smooth slide-lock closure ensures a secure, leak-proof seal every time—no more struggling with sticky zippers! With three practical sizes (Small: 20*10*4cm, Medium: 23*15*5cm, Large: 26.5*32*8cm), these bags effortlessly store snacks, crafts, makeup, travel essentials, and more. ﻿ Why You’ll Love It: ✔️ FREE BONUS ACCESSORIES: A sturdy bag organizer keeps your space tidy, while the included marker pen lets you label contents directly on the bag’s writable surface—no more guessing games! ✔️ BUILT TO LAST: Crafted from thick, BPA-free material, these bags resist punctures and withstand repeated use. Washable and reusable, they’re an eco-friendly alternative to single-use plastics. ✔️ SMART DESIGN: The expandable bottom adds extra capacity for bulky items, and the airtight seal locks in freshness for liquids, powders, or freezer storage. ✔️PULL-OUT DESIGN: Our ziplock bags feature a convenient pull-out design for easy access. With 60 pieces per pack, you'll have more than enough to meet your long-term storage needs. ✔️MULTI-SIZE: Three different sizes of ziplock bags can be classified to store various foods, such as fruits, vegetables, sandwiches, nuts, meat, etc., to keep the food fresh. In addition, when traveling, you can also use a zippered bag to store toiletries, cosmetics, small clothes, etc. It is waterproof and moisture-proof, transparent and visible, and very practical. Perfect For: Meal prepping and pantry organization Travel toiletry kits and diaper bag essentials Craft supplies, office stationery, or small hardware Camping, hiking, or outdoor adventures ﻿ Go Green & Save Money—Ditch disposable bags and invest in a durable, multipurpose solution that grows with your needs!
